title: No Salt Just Sugar - LF> Top/sup flex gold-plat
body:
Hello all~ 

We are looking for high gold to plat top and support players to join our club for flex. 

**We don't really mind what rank you actually are as long as you have the right attitude**. You might be silver but have the mental stability of a challenger player. We are casual players, and we like winning but by no means are we salty when we lose.

If you get offended easily, or consider yourself too politically correct then perhaps this club is not for you...

Requirements for joining:
- Can play at least 2-3 champions for your chosen role (Ya know...in case your main pick gets banned ;D)
- Can discord (We are a very vocal team, and we like to blame our jungler for the bad choices we made in our personal lives)
- Ages 20+ preferred (We cannot help you study for your HSC exams)
- **Not a salty human**
- Can play regularly (Personal life/work life comes first - but please squeeze in a few sneaky games of league per week if you can)

Add me in-game b1g d1ck Dave

Look forward to hearing from you!

replies.body: Hey im in Iron but dont get salty. i am a casual player that would like to improve
if you have smurfs, happy to get some tips
Hit me up id be keen as a bean
